item.description:
The organizer's invite you to a winter gathering to be held in the Common Room at Ashton Mills in Cumberland, RI. Where we'll spend from 6pm to 10pm socializing, playing games and generally just experiencing a warm, friendly winter (well, pre-winter technically) evening. Between the amenities of the space we've secured and the entertaining antics of your organizers and newest friends, a good night is all but guaranteed

Among the amenities of the space are a pool table, couches, bistro tables and chairs as well as a fireplace and big screen television. Please feel free to bring games!



Food and Drink
While not specifically a potluck, we are asking attendees to bring some sort of finger food (mini-quiches, veggie platter, cheese and crackers, etc.).

This event will be BYOB (please limit to beer and wine). Matt is planning to bring a batch of home made eggnog.

We ask that all attendees drink responsibly, especially if they are driving.



Activities:

  • Pool
  • Games (whatever you bring! - Cranium, scrabble, pictionary?)
  • White Elephant/Yankee Swap (optional! More info below.)


About the White Elephant Exchange
If you wish to participate in the White Elephant Exchange/Yankee Swap, bring one small gift wrapped item that is worth less than $10. Everyone who brings a gift will be eligible to participate in one of the most interesting and potentially fun gift exchanges ever seen. Examples of good items: DVD, book, gift cards, novelty bottle openers, (almost anything from Oop!), small toys.


A $5/person fee will be collected at the door to cover the cost of renting the space and providing cups, plates and napkins, and a selection of finger foods.



Directions and Parking:
From 295 take exit 10
Go left onto Mendon Rd./Route 122
Go through three sets of lights (the second being a blinking light)
After the third light, go right onto Store Hill
Go right at the stop sign
Cross the railroad tracks
Arrive at Ashton Mills

Parking is available on both sides of the tracks.

We will provide an access code to attendees to enter the main lobby.
item.name: Winter Party
